meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Lychnis.
meanings.sent1: The lychnis in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted a new lychnis in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns under the lychnis leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the bright petals of a lychnis.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the lychnis filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the family Caryophyllaceae.
meanings.sent1: The lychnis genus includes various colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different species within the lychnis genus.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar decided to build its cocoon on a lychnis stem.
meanings.sent4: The lychnis genus stood out like a vibrant painting in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the lychnis genus captivated all who passed by.
